properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_PWD , MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_EMAIL , MEMBER_PHONE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PWD = ?
INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_PWD , MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_EMAIL , MEMBER_PHONE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEMBER.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO DOG ( DOG_NO , MEMBER_NO , DOG_NAME , DOG_VALUE , DOG_AGE , DOG_GENDER , DOG_VACCINE , DOG_SIGNIFICANT ) VALUES ( SEQ_DOG.NEXTVAL , SEQ_MEMBER.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
